title: Everybody's Golf is Shutting Down Servers - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.30.22
description:
Go to http://www.kindafunny.com/uplift to Uplift your life with an Uplift Desk!

Blessing and Gamespot's Tamoor Hussain talk about Everybody's Golf servers shutting down, Activision settling a lawsuit, and more.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:00:15 - The Stanley Parable Ultra Deluxe Release Date Announced!
00:11:20 - Housekeeping
Over on Tik Tok: I have my impressions video up of Atlanta season 3, episode 1. It’s a quick spoilery breakdown of the episode that you can check out over on @kindafunnygames on tik tok.
Over on youtube: Our Moon Knight episode 1 review Screencast episode is going up today. That’ll be on Youtube.com/kindafunny and the screencast podcast feed.
PS I Love You XOXO is recording tomorrow with the episode going up on Friday. We’ll talk about Project Spartacus and more so get those questions in on Patreon and look out for the episode dropping on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
00:13:09 - Everybody's Golf’s online servers are shutting down
00:20:26 - Fast & Furious: Crossroads Is being delisted less than two years after release
00:27:03 - Activision Blizzard has settled a Sexual Harassment Lawsuit For $18 Million
00:31:52 - The studio that made Wattam is shutting down
00:42:04 - Nintendo could be preparing to add new NES and SNES games to Switch Online
00:46:40 - Out today
00:56:10 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Tim

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
